title: January 24 reminds us of the importance of education worldwide
content:
Digital Cultural Heritage plays an important role in enhancing education by promoting values of respect, tolerance, and responsibility, and by stimulating critical thinking in young people. This is why we are happy to support and celebrate January 24 as the International Day of Education.We are involved in many cooperative projects and initiatives aimed at enhancing  [...]
